pages.text: The $(item)Human Heart$() is warm, constantly. It is a $(marked)Rite Tool$() and $(o)you are a horrible person for having this.
In order to obtain this, you'll need to slay a $(marked)Villager$() with a $(l:vitalis/entry_heart_stone)Heart of Stone$() while holding $(l:alchemy/entry_wine)Redmost Wine$() in the offhand.
